author: Meng Chaoji
notes: 蒙朝吉 / Meng Chaoji. 瑤族布努语方言研究 / Yao zu Bunu yu fang yan yan jiu [A Study of the Bunu Dialects of the Yao People]. Beijing: 民族出版社 / Min zu chu ban she, 2001.ISO 639-3: bwx. Dongnu (东努) is a regional vernacular (土语) of Bunu (布努). The selected variant is that of Nongjing Village (弄京村), Qibainong Township (七百弄乡) Dahua County (大化县), Guangxi, China.Tones:1 = /33/, 1' = /55/2 = /13/, 2' = /35/3 = /43/, 3' = /54/4 = /232/, 4' = /454/5 = /41/6 = /221/7 = /32/8 = /21/
